不攻击，持续恢复范围内所有友军<@ba.kw>生命</>（每秒相当于自身攻击力<.en: Does not attack </br>Continously heal all ally in range </br>(<@ba.kw>{attack@atk_to_hp_recovery_ratio:0%}</> of self ATK every second)</br>Self unaffected by <$ba.inspire>Inspire</> effects

攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，且会在<@ba.kw>{attack@m.en: Attack deals <@ba.kw>Arts Damage</> and inflicts <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> <@ba.kw> for {attack@sluggish}s</></br>Attack can chain up to <@ba.kw>{attack@max_target}</> enemies </br> Damage reduced by 15% per jump</br>

能够阻挡两个敌人.jp: 敵を2体敵をまでブロツク

同时恢复三个友方单位的生命.en: Heal up to 3 friendly unit at once

攻击造成<@ba.kw>超远距离的群体法术伤害</>.en: Attack deals <@ba.kw>Super Long Range Area Arts Damage</>

攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>.jp: 敵に術ダメーゾを与える

自身生命会不断流失.en: Self HP will decreases over time

不成为其他角色的治疗目标，每次攻击到敌人后回复自身<@ba.kw>{value}.en: Cannot be healed by other operators</br>Heal {value} on every hit on enemies

可以进行<@ba.kw>远程攻击</>，但此时攻击力降低至80%.en: Can perform <@ba.kw>ranged attack</></br>However attack decreased to 80% when attacking enemies with ranged attack

能够阻挡三个敌人.jp: 敵を3体敵をまでブロツク

能够阻挡一个敌人.jp: 敵を1体敵をまでブロツク

攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>\\n可以使用<@ba.kw>召唤物</>.en: Attack deals <@ba.kw>Arts damage</></br>Can use <@ba.kw>summons</> in battle
攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>\\n可以使用<@ba.kw>召唤物</>.jp: 敵に術ダメーゾを与える

同时攻击阻挡的<@ba.kw>所有敌人</>.en: Attack <@ba.kw>multiple enemies</> equal to block count

击杀敌人后获得1点部署费用，撤退时返还初始部署费用.en: Obtain 1 cost on every kill</br>Full cost refund on retreat

同时攻击阻挡的<@ba.kw>所有敌人</>\\n可以放置于远程位.en: Attack <@ba.kw>multiple enemies</> equal to block count</br>Can be placed on higher ground
同时攻击阻挡的<@ba.kw>所有敌人</>\\n可以放置于远程位.jp: ブロツク中の敵全員を同時に攻撃

只有阻挡敌人时才能够回复技力.en: Can only gain SP when blocking

攻击对小范围的<@ba.kw>地面</>敌人造成<@ba.kw>两次</>物理伤.en: Attacks deals physical splash damage <@ba.kw>Twice</> to <@ba.kw>Ground</> enemies in a small area</br>(2nd hit is an aftershock with halved damage)

技能可以使敌人产生<@ba.kw>位移</>\\n可以放置于远程位.en: Skill can <@ba.kw>Displace</> enemy</br>Can be placed on higher ground

通常时<@ba.kw>不攻击</>且防御力和法术抗性大幅度<@ba.kw>提升<.en: <@ba.kw>Does not attack</> normally, instead gain <@ba.kw>increased</> Defense(<@ba.kw>+{def:0%}</>) & Arts resistance(<@ba.kw>+{magic_resistance}</>) when skill is inactive</br>Deals <@ba.kw>Arts damage to all enemies within range</> during skill duration

可以攻击到<@ba.kw>较远敌人</>，攻击自身未阻挡的敌人时攻击力提升至12.en: Can attack <@ba.kw>distant enemies</></br>Attack Increased to 120% when attacking enemies not blocked by self

可以攻击到<@ba.kw>较远敌人</>，攻击自身未阻挡的敌人时攻击力提升至<@.en: Can attack <@ba.kw>distant enemies</></br>Attack Increased to <@ba.kw>{atk_scale:0%}</> when attacking enemies not blocked by self

攻击范围内的<@ba.kw>所有敌人</>，对自己前方一横排的敌人攻击力提升至1.en: Attack <@ba.kw>all enemies</> within range</br>Attack Increased to 150% to enemies a row ahead

对攻击范围内<@ba.kw>所有敌人</>造成伤害\\n拥有50%的物理和法术闪.en: Attack <@ba.kw>all enemies</> within range</br>50% Physical & Arts Evasion</br><@ba.kw>Lower priority to be attacked by enemies</>

操作<@ba.kw>浮游单元</>造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>\\n单元攻.en: Controls a <@ba.kw>Drone</> that deals Arts damage</br>Drone damage increased when attacking the same enemy (Up to 110% of the operator's Attack)

攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，在找不到攻击目标时可以将攻击能量<@ba.en: Attack deals <@ba.kw>Arts damage</></br>When there's no targets within range, can <@ba.kw>store</> the attack energy (up to 3 times) and fire it off in a burst
攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，在找不到攻击目标时可以将攻击能量<@ba.jp: 敵に術ダメーゾを与える

无法被友方角色治疗，攻击造成<@ba.kw>群体伤害</>，每攻击到一个敌人回复.en: Cannot be healed by allies</br>Attack <@ba.kw>all enemies</> within range</></br>Recovers <@ba.kw>{value}</> HP with every enemy hit (up to Block count)

通常不攻击且阻挡数为0，技能未开启时<@ba.kw>{max_stack_cnt.en: Does not attack and have 0 block count normally</br>Gradually increase attack power up to <@ba.kw>+{atk:0%}</> after <@ba.kw>{max_stack_cnt}</> seconds when skill is not active</br>Attack increase resets after skill ends

拥有较大治疗范围，但在治疗较远目标时治疗量变为<@ba.kw>{heal_sca.en:
Larger Healing Range
However attack power will be reduced to <@ba.kw>{heal_scale:0%}
when healing distant target

优先攻击攻击范围内<@ba.kw>防御力最低</>的敌方单位.en: Prioritize <@ba.kw>lowest defense</> enemies within attack range

再部署时间<@ba.kw>减少</>，撤退时不返还<@ba.kw>部署费用</>.en: <@ba.kw>Decreased</> Redeployment Time</br><@ba.kw>No cost refund</> on retreat</br>Uses 3 cost on every 3 second</br>(automatically retreat when insufficient cost)

可以使用陷阱来协助作战，但陷阱无法放置于<@ba.kw>敌人已在</>的格子中.en: Can use traps in battle</br>Cannot deploy trap in tiles with <@ba.kw>enemies in it</>

受到致命伤时不撤退，切换成<替身>作战（替身阻挡数为0），持续20s后自身再次替.en: Does not retreat when receiving lethal damage</br>Instead, swaps to a [Substitute] to continue fighting ([Substitute] has 0 Block Count)</br>After a certain period, the [Substitute] will be replaced by the original

技能开启时普通攻击会造成法术伤害.en: Attack cause Arts damage on skill

技能发动期间阻挡数变为0.en: Reduce block count to 0 when using skills

可以在攻击范围内选择一次<@ba.kw>战术点</>来召唤援军，自身攻击援军阻挡.en: Can summon <@ba.kw>Tactical point</> within attack range once</br>Damage increased to 150% when attacking enemies blocked by summon

可以额外部署在远程位.en: Can be placed on higher ground

首个召唤物部署时<@ba.kw>不消耗</>部署位（场上最后一个召唤物撤退或被击.en: First summon deploy <@ba.kw>will not</> use deployment slots</br>(Does not refund deployment slot on last summon retreat or knocked down)

恢复友方单位生命，且不受<@ba.kw>部署数量</>限制，但再部署时间极长.en: Heal friendly unit</br>Ignore <@ba.kw>Deploy count</> limit</br>Long redeployment time

不进行攻击，且不受<@ba.kw>部署数量</>限制，但再部署时间极长.en: Does Not Attack</br>Ignore <@ba.kw>Deploy count</> limit</br>Long redeployment time

能够阻挡一个敌人，且不受<@ba.kw>部署数量</>限制，但再部署时间极长.en: Can block single enemy</br>Ignore <@ba.kw>Deploy count</> limit</br>Long redeployment time

能够阻挡两个敌人，使用<支援装置>协助作战.en: Can block 2 enemies</br>Can use <@ba.kw>Support Devices</> in battle

恢复友方单位生命，并回复相当于攻击力<@ba.kw>{ep_heal_ratio.en: Heal friendly unit</br>Recovers <@ba.dt.element>Elemental damage</> equal to <@ba.kw>{ep_heal_ratio:0%}</> of Attack Power</br>(Can heal the <@ba.dt.element>Elemental damage</> of unhurt units)

攻击越远的敌人造成的伤害越高（最高提升<@ba.kw>{damage_scale.en: Attack increase based on distance to target</br>(Up to maximum of <@ba.kw>{damage_scale:0%}</> increase)

攻击的敌人未被击倒时自身额外获得<@ba.kw>{sp}</>点技力.en: Gain <@ba.kw>{sp}</> extra SP when attacking enemy without killing

同时恢复<@ba.kw>四</>个友方单位的生命.en: Heal up to <@ba.kw>4</> friendly unit at once

不阻挡敌人时优先<@ba.kw>远程群体</>物理攻击.en: Prioritize <@ba.kw>Long range splash attack</> when not blocking

撤退时返还<@ba.kw>大量</>该次部署费用.en: Refund <@ba.kw>{withdraw_cost_recover_ratio:0%}</> of operator deploy cost on retreat

周围四格没有友方干员时攻击力<@ba.kw>+{atk:0%}</>.en: Attack <@ba.kw>+{atk:0%}</> when there are no friendly operator in the surrounding four squares

攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，且会在<@ba.kw>{attack@m.en: Attack deals <@ba.kw>Arts Damage</> and inflicts <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> <@ba.kw>for {attack@sluggish}s</></br>Attack can chain up to <@ba.kw>{attack@max_target}</> enemies </br> Damage reduced by <@ba.kw>10%</> per jump</br>

Attack deals <@ba.kw>Arts Damage</> and inflicts <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> <@ba.kw>for {attack@sluggish}s</></br>Attack can chain up to <@ba.kw>{attack@max_target}</> enemies </br> <@ba.kw>Damage no longer reduced</> per jump</br>
